subject: Missing package
description_text:
Hello I placed an order on Amazon with your official store and was supposed to receive me pedals and the three rumble motors today but I've only received the rumble motors and not the pedals the tracking number is 397033555172
And the order number is 113-4167398-8745053
Any help would be greatly appreciated

Get Outlook for Android<https://aka.ms/AAb9ysg>

conversations.body_text: Hi jacob erbeck,  Here is the tracking number for the pedals: 887321360357, the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrac. And the tracking number for the base plate is: 1ZJ201H40315704884, the shipping carrier is UPS, you can track it via https://www.ups.com/track.
